subject: Video of the "Edison Box"
author: Urkel23
full_text:
This video explains all the features of the box.  So, get some popcorn and enjoy.

This is the first box to have shack hack modes as well as linear and random adjustable sweeps.

Also, the only box other than the "Minibox" to have a working random circuit in it.  

The video:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9539MtbvRc4


-Steve H.
